title: shivagangA
sahitya:
shivagangA nagara nivAsini shrI rAjarAjEshvari mAmava


caraNam 1    abhaya varadE amba mAyE nigamAgaNita vibhavE paramashiva jAyE
  caraNam 2    vadana ruci vijita kamalE ubhaya pArshva virAjitha vANI kamalE
  caraNam 3    sadA rAmadAsanutE sharaNAgata jana pAlana caNa shubha caritE
